title: Gautam Adani writes to Bangladesh chief advisor Muhammad Yunus, seeks early payment of $800 mn in power dues
description: Adani Group chairman Gautam Adani has sought the intervention of Muhammad Yunus, chief advisor to the Bangladesh government, for the early clearance of $800 million owed by the Bangladesh Power Development Board to Adani Power. The dues have accumulated over eight to nine months for electricity supplied from Adani's coal-fired power plant in Godda, Jharkhand.
